meanings.sent1: The filagreed jewelry sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with filagreed decorations for the party.
meanings.sent3: She wore a filagreed crown made of shiny beads.
meanings.sent4: The filagreed patterns on the dress resembled intricate lace.
meanings.sent5: The filagreed details on the vase added a touch of elegance.

meanings.sent1: She filagreed the cake with frosting swirls.

meanings.sent5: They filagreed the room with fairy lights for the celebration.

meanings.definition: Ornamental work of fine wire twisted into delicate tracery.
meanings.sent1: The filagreed metal gate welcomed visitors to the garden.
meanings.sent2: She admired the filagreed patterns on the antique necklace.
meanings.sent3: The filagreed design on the lampshade cast beautiful shadows.
meanings.sent4: The artisan crafted a filagreed birdcage for the canary.
meanings.sent5: The filagreed bracelet glinted in the candlelight.
